channel.title: I foloed A Tut Hasnt Worked Asked Person For Help Hasnt Responded Help Me Please

item.title: I foloed A Tut Hasnt Worked Asked Person For Help Hasnt Responded Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Read tutorials on if and repeat. Here it is corrected (but untested):
[scar]program autominer;
{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
// Mine’n’Drop \

var
x,y : integer;

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
begin
if findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336) then mmouse(x,y,3,3) //etc…
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
end
until(invfull)
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2-28);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
begin
minero;
dropal;
end
until(false)
end.
[/scar]

Read full topic
item.source: I foloed A Tut Hasnt Worked Asked Person For Help Hasnt Responded Help Me Please

item.title: I foloed A Tut Hasnt Worked Asked Person For Help Hasnt Responded Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

Add var x: integer at the top of your script.

You can’t call something without declaring it.

Read full topic

item.title: I foloed A Tut Hasnt Worked Asked Person For Help Hasnt Responded Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @xerlot xerlot
item.description:
@xerlot wrote:

look I have Done This

[code]program New;
{// mine N Drop \}

const rockwait= 2000;
const rockcolor=9859920;

procedure minero;
begin
repeat
if findcolorspiral(x,y,rockcolor,3,3,515,336) then begin mmouse(x,y,3,3) etc…
istextat2(9,9,‘Mine’,20)
mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
wait(rockwait+random(300))
until(invfull)
if (invfull = true) then
end;

Procedure dropal;
begin
dropto(2-28);
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
repeat
minero;
dropal;
until(false)
end.
[/code]
And I get This Error

Failed when compiling Line 10: [Error] (10:20): Unknown identifier 'x' in script
Please Help
